examples: a new tax could be levied on industry to pay for cleaning up contaminated land
synonyms: collect; raremulct "the government's right to levy taxes"

definitions.definition: impose a tax, fee, or fine on.
examples: there will be powers to levy the owner
synonyms: collect; raremulct "the government's right to levy taxes"

definitions.definition: seize (property) to satisfy a legal judgment.
examples: there were no goods to levy upon
he sought to levy one man from each parish for service
